title: Latvian and German Foreign Ministers meet in Rīga
summary_full: On 26th January, Latvian Minister of Foreign Affairs, Baiba Braže, welcomed the Federal Minister for Foreign Affairs of Germany, Dr Johann Wadephul, during his working visit to Latvia.
summary_public: On 26th January, Latvian Minister of Foreign Affairs, Baiba Braže, welcomed the Federal Minister for Foreign Affairs of Germany, Dr Johann Wadephul, during his working visit to Latvia.
